Name: Battle Royale Bootcamp
About the game: Battle Royale Bootcamp is an action-packed battle royale simulator. Train your reflexes, aim, recoil control and awareness before you hit your favourite online multiplayer BR games! BRB launches you into a training environment designed to recreate the feeling of your favourite online BR games. If you're sick of spending 20 minutes looting, only to get dominated in combat...this game is for you! Get used to the feeling of BR style combat in this single player aim trainer so you can dominate online without shaking.
